headline.title: BLIND TEXT HEADLINE
headline.beforeInfo: Be the first to earn and stake HOPR with our limited token release.
headline.mainInfo: Every minute, people and companies transmit millions of gigabytes of data across the globe. This figure is growing exponentially thanks to new technologies such as 5G and the Internet of Things. This data all needs protecting, and so does the metadata it generates. The HOPR protocol provides network-level metadata privacy for everyone, and the HOPR network is driven by the HOPR token.
headline.fPoint: Join our initial limited token release to be one of the first to earn and stake HOPR.
headline.sPoint: There will be only XXXX tokens available during this initial phase.

banner.label: Be among the first who profit the most from staking our HOPR Token.

features.payMain: Spend HOPR tokens to send data through the HOPR network with complete data and metadata privacy.
features.stakeMain: Lock HOPR tokens in your node to relay user data and cover traffic. The more you stake, the more data you can relay, and the more you can earn.
features.title: Token features
features.voteMain: Participate in decentralized, community-enabling governance decisions to shape the future of HOPR.

further.infoTopTitleA: Install a HOPR node for free via GitHub
further.infoTopTitleAAbout: Anyone can run a HOPR node on their own hardware! We provide easy-to-install software for Linux, macOS, Windows, docker and cloud environments. We also sell a dedicated hardware node for faster staking.
further.infoTopTitleBAbout: The HOPR Node PC is a powerful plug-and-play hardware device which lets you run a HOPR node around the clock.
further.title: Further Reading

hardware.about: Anyone can run a HOPR node on their own hardware! We provide easy-to-install software for Linux, macOS, Windows, Docker and Cloud Environments. Furthermore we also sell an dedicated hardware not for faster staking.More at the End of the Page.
hardware.title: HOPR-NODE ON GITHUB

token.about: The HOPR Network is powered by the HOPR Token, a utility token on the Ethereum Network.
token.secondSubAbout: Starting at an initial circulating supply of 75 million, HOPR tokens will be released over a period of 5 years. A quarter of all HOPR tokens are available only to stakers as a reward for relaying cover traffic.
token.subTitle: KEY METRICS
token.title: Token Release

why.mainText: Every minute, people and companies transmit millions of gigabytes of data across the globe. This figure is growing exponentially thanks to new technologies such as 5G and the Internet of Things. This data all needs protecting, and so does the metadata it generates. The HOPR protocol provides network-level metadata privacy for everyone, and the HOPR network is driven by the HOPR token.
why.title: Why does it matter?

work.performantMain: HOPR’s custom layer-two scaling solution is based on probabilistic payment channels. This ensures payment always settles without unnecessary blockchain transaction fees, all while protecting node runners’ metadata.
work.privateMain: The HOPR network is a decentralized incentivized minxes, ensuring complete data and metadata privacy for everyone who uses it to transmit data.
work.profitableMain: HOPR’s unique proof-of-relay mechanism means every node runner is incentivized to correctly relay data in exchange for HOPR tokens.
work.title: How does it work
